price: 8. Glorifica el nombre de tu Señor y conságrate a adorarlo con devoción.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
